That kind of Aurora is cute too,\""},{"lineNumber":117583,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ですって！？","translatedEnglishLine":"she said!?"},{"lineNumber":117584,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やーん、ジーク様ー、やんやんやんー♪","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yaan, Lord Sieg— yan yan yan♪\""},{"lineNumber":117585,"originalJapaneseLine":"等身大ジーク様抱き枕に全身で抱きついて、","translatedEnglishLine":"She hugged the life-sized Lord Sieg body pillow tightly with her whole body,"},{"lineNumber":117586,"originalJapaneseLine":"オーロラが左右にごろんごろん。","translatedEnglishLine":"Aurora rolled left and right."},{"lineNumber":117587,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アホと違うか、こいつ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Isn't she an idiot or something?\""},{"lineNumber":117588,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス様、しーっ、しーっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sir Rance, shh, shh.\""},{"lineNumber":117589,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":117590,"originalJapaneseLine":"「む、静かになったな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, she’s quiet now.\""},{"lineNumber":117591,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……はあ、ジーク様」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Sigh, Lord Sieg.\""},{"lineNumber":117592,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どうしてオーロラだけ残して","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Why did you leave only Aurora behind"},{"lineNumber":117593,"originalJapaneseLine":"　逝ってしまわれたんですか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"and depart...\""},{"lineNumber":117594,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぎゅっと、","translatedEnglishLine":"Tightly,"},{"lineNumber":117595,"originalJapaneseLine":"オーロラがジークの人形に抱きつき、","translatedEnglishLine":"Aurora hugged the Sieg doll,"},{"lineNumber":117596,"originalJapaneseLine":"顔をうずめる。","translatedEnglishLine":"burying her face."},{"lineNumber":117597,"originalJapaneseLine":"「本当は分かっています……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I really understand deep down..."},{"lineNumber":117598,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ジーク様がもう復活できないこと……」","translatedEnglishLine":"that Lord Sieg can never come back...\""},{"lineNumber":117599,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But...\""},{"lineNumber":117600,"originalJapaneseLine":"「絶対大丈夫です……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It will definitely be okay..."},{"lineNumber":117601,"originalJapaneseLine":"　何か……何か手がありますよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"There is... there is some way...\""},{"lineNumber":117602,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから……安心して下さいね、ジーク様……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So... please rest assured, Lord Sieg...\""},{"lineNumber":117603,"originalJapaneseLine":"「使徒のオーロラが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Aurora the Apostle..."},{"lineNumber":117604,"originalJapaneseLine":"　絶対に復活させてみせますから……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I will absolutely make you resurrect...\""},{"lineNumber":117605,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ジーク様ぁ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Lord Sieg...\""},{"lineNumber":117606,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":117607,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くうくう……くうくう……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Zzz... zzz...\""},{"lineNumber":117608,"originalJapaneseLine":"少しの間の後、ベッドの上からは","translatedEnglishLine":"After a little while, from the bed,"},{"lineNumber":117609,"originalJapaneseLine":"穏やかな寝息が聞こえるようになった。","translatedEnglishLine":"calm breathing sounds could be heard."},{"lineNumber":117610,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":117611,"originalJapaneseLine":"ベッドの下から這い出てきた","translatedEnglishLine":"Crawling out from under the bed,"},{"lineNumber":117612,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス達がジッとオーロラの寝顔を見ていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others quietly watched Aurora's sleeping face."},{"lineNumber":117613,"originalJapaneseLine":"「このアホ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This idiot...\""},{"lineNumber":117614,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今後は少し優しくしてやるか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Maybe I should be a little kinder from now on.\""},{"lineNumber":117615,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい……そうですね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes... that's right...\""},{"lineNumber":117616,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},{"lineNumber":117617,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":117618,"originalJapaneseLine":"次の日――","translatedEnglishLine":"The next day—"},{"lineNumber":117619,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス、ちねーーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rance, dieeeeee!\""},{"lineNumber":117620,"originalJapaneseLine":"「甘ーい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Too soft!\""},{"lineNumber":117621,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あーーーれーーー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Aaaahhhh!?\""},{"lineNumber":117622,"originalJapaneseLine":"オーロラの勢いを逆に利用して、","translatedEnglishLine":"Using Aurora's momentum against her,"},{"lineNumber":117623,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスがくるーんと投げ飛ばす。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance spun and threw her."},{"lineNumber":117624,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわーん！　殺させて下さいよー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Waaah! Please let me kill you!\""},{"lineNumber":117625,"originalJapaneseLine":"「アホ！　誰がオーケするか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Idiot! Who would okay that!\""},{"lineNumber":117626,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわーん！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Waaah!"},{"lineNumber":117627,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランスを無惨に殺してスッキリしたいよー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I want to brutally kill Rance and feel better!\""},{"lineNumber":117628,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えーい、帰れ帰れ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, go home, go home!\""},{"lineNumber":117629,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うわーーーん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Waaah!\""},{"lineNumber":117630,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……優しく？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Kindly?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今だけはこんなオーロラを見ないで下さい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please don't look at this Aurora just for now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「えっ、そんなオーロラも可愛いですよ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Huh? That kind of Aurora is cute too,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「やーん、ジーク様ー、やんやんやんー♪
等身大ジーク様抱き枕に全身で抱きついて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She hugged the life-sized Lord Sieg body pillow tightly with her whole body,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: オーロラが左右にごろんごろん。
「どうしてオーロラだけ残して
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Why did you leave only Aurora behind

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 逝ってしまわれたんですか……」
オーロラがジークの人形に抱きつき、
ジーク様がもう復活できないこと……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that Lord Sieg can never come back..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か……何か手がありますよ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There is... there is some way..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから……安心して下さいね、ジーク様……」
絶対に復活させてみせますから……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I will absolutely make you resurrect..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 少しの間の後、ベッドの上からは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After a little while, from the bed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 穏やかな寝息が聞こえるようになった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: calm breathing sounds could be heard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベッドの下から這い出てきた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Crawling out from under the bed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達がジッとオーロラの寝顔を見ていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others quietly watched Aurora's sleeping face.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今後は少し優しくしてやるか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Maybe I should be a little kinder from now on."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: オーロラの勢いを逆に利用して、
ランスがくるーんと投げ飛ばす。
「うわーん！　殺させて下さいよー！」
「アホ！　誰がオーケするか！」
ランスを無惨に殺してスッキリしたいよー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to brutally kill Rance and feel better!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
